Title: Root out the Hu Feng counter-revolutionary clique exhibition cartoons 1
Publisher: Shanghai renmin meishu chubanshe (上海人民美术出版社)
Notes: Most of the cartoons of a set of 20 posters, published during the anti-Hu Feng movement, cannot be linked to any of the 17 designers mentioned on the opening sheet.This first cartoon of the set shows a hand dragging a warren of counter-revolutionaries out of a suterranean hiding place. They include Hu Feng, militarists, American army personnel, and assorted enemies of the state in a flurry of documents.
